sentences.sContent: My parents were a bit dubious about it all at first but we soon convinced them.
sentences.sCn: 起初我父母亲对此尚心存疑虑，但很快我们便说服了他们。

synos.tran: 可疑的；暧昧的；无把握的；半信半疑的

remMethod.val: dub(不确定， 不明确) + ious → 靠不住的， 不确定的

trans.tranOther: If you are dubious about something, you are not completely sure about it and have not yet made up your mind about it
